results.title: Impact of oxidized LDL/LOX-1 system on ligamentum flavum hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: In functional analysis, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment neutralized the oxidized LDL-mediated induction of mRNA expressions of LF @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ markers.

results.title: KLF2-dependent transcriptional regulation safeguards the heart against pathological hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: Additionally, we found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ elevates @GENE_KLF2 @GENE_10365 @@@KLF2@@@ expression in cardiomyocytes, which subsequently alleviates @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@cardiomyocyte hypertrophy@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin cream alleviates dermal fibrosis in a rabbit ear hypertrophic scar model
results.text_hl: Topical application of 10% @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in a cream formulation ameliorated excisional wound-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@scar hypertrophy@@@

results.title: Simvastatin Significantly Reduced Alcohol-Induced Cardiac Damage in Adolescent Mice
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Alcohols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000438 @@@Alcohol@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@cardiomyocyte hypertrophy@@@ was significantly reduced by both concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@.
